original_text: We have different gifts, according to the grace given to each of us. If your gift is prophesying, then prophesy in accordance with your faith;
korean_text: 우리에게 주신 은혜대로 받은 은사가 각각 다르니 혹 예언이면 믿음의 분수대로,

sentences.original_text: according to the grace given to each of us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 각 사람에게 주신 은혜에 따라

sentences.original_text: then prophesy in accordance with your faith
